name: Get Out! (Aghnaths)
description:
Made for Game Jam 

Indonesia

Sebuah game yang terinspirasi dari The Binding Isaac, dan juga wabah virus corona yang baru baru ini terjadi. agar kita semakin menjaga diri dan rajin cuci tangan :D.Kalahkan virus di setiap room dan jangan berlama-lama, kesehatanmu akan berkurang jika virus tidak dibunuh.Ambil Masker dan Sabun untuk mencegah kesehatanmu memburuk. 

Kontrol:

WASD-Movement

Space-Shoot

English

A game inspired by The Binding Isaac, and also a recent corona virus outbreak. so that we increasingly guard ourselves and diligently wash hands. Defeat the virus in each room and do not linger, your health will be reduced if the virus is not killed. Take a Mask and Soap to prevent your health from deteriorating.

Control:

WASD-Movement

Space-Shoot

Team:

Rifky-Graphic

D-Gui and Logo

Aghnat-Programming

Android version available soon.

Thank you so much for my team to make this game is playable.
